title: Input Schema for GLUE Code
description: A configuration to run GLUE code with

tag.description: Tag to expect from solver code

dbFileName.description: Filename to use for filesystem SQL database

solverCode.description: Solver Code packets expected Corresponding to SolverCode Enum

glueCodeMode.description: Mode to Run GLUE Code in Corresponding to ALInterfaceMode Enum

alBackend.description: Active Learning Backend to use Corresponding to LearnerBackend Enum

GNDthreshold.description: Threshold for number of fine grain simulations before retraining active learning models

LAMMPSPath.description: Optional path to LAMMPS Binary (if not using Spack)

ExpectedMPIRanks.description: Number of MPI Ranks to expect from coarse grain solver

GenerateTrainingData.description: Generate Training Data if Running Appropriate Script

ReadTrainingData.description: Read Out Training Data to CLI if Running Appropriate Script

SchedulerInterface.description: Scheduler Mode/Interface to use corresponding to SchedulerInterface Enum

JobEnvFile.description: File to execute as part of job to set environments (modules, vars, etc). If not absolute will assume path exists in ${REPO}/envFiles

SpackRoot.description: Path to Spack (Overwritten by User Env)

SpackCompilerAndMPI.description: Compiler and MPI String to pass Spack

MPIRanksForBlockingRuns.description: If using blocking (shell) scheduler, the number of MPI ranks per fine grain task

RelativeError.description: Relative Error Threshold for ICF Comparisons

ThreadsPerMPIRankForSlurm.description: If using slurm scheduler, the number of 'threads' per MPI rank

NodesPerSlurmJob.description: If using slurm scheduler, the number of nodes per job

MaxSlurmJobs.description: If using slurm scheduler, the maximum number of concurrent jobs

SlurmPartition.description: If using slurm scheduler, what partition of nodes to request from

SlotsPerJobForFlux.description: Number of 'slots' per job in flux: This is the number of MPI Ranks

CoresPerSlotForFlux.description: Number of cores per 'slot' in flux: probably 1

NodesPerJobForFlux.description: Number of nodes per 'slot' flux: probably 1
